Package Game

Class GameClient

java.lang.Object
Game.GameClient
All Implemented Interfaces:
AutoCloseable
public class GameClient extends Object implements AutoCloseable
Class name: GameClient Methods list: start, main, protocol, close Constant list: N/A Purpose: GameClient class contains main method to start the client window and has close method for AutoCloseable implementation
Since:
JavaSE-17
Version:
03 Dec 2022
Author:
Amy Fujimoto

      public void start()
      Method name: start Purpose: Starts the game by instantiating ClientModel, ClientView, ClientController, and GameBasic objects Algorithm: Initialized objects and calls method to start client window

      Method name: main Purpose: To run the client program
      Parameters:
      args - an array of command line arguments for the application
      clientView - ClientView object
      clientModel - ClientModel object Algorithm: Reads objects and values from parameter and starts client depending on provided value
